Step 1: firstly, heat kadai with 3 tsp oil and saute 1 tbsp spring onion.

 Step 2: also, saute 1/4 capsicum and 1 cup cabbage till they cook slightly.

 Step 3: now add 2 tsp schezwan sauce and 1/4 tsp salt. saute for a minute.

 Step 4: add in cooked noodles and mix gently coating well with sauce.

 Step 5: further, add 2 tbsp spring onions and give a good mix. keep aside.

 Step 6: now heat a tawa with 1/2 tsp butter and warm up chapathi.

 Step 7: spread 1 tsp schezwan sauce and 1 tsp tomato sauce over chapathi.

 Step 8: place handful of noodles in centre of chapathi.

 Step 9: sprinkle some chaat masala.

 Step 10:now roll tight making sure the stuffing is intact.

 Step 11:wrap the roti in an aluminium foil or butter paper.

 Step 12:finally, serve schezwan noodles frankie or pack to kids lunch box.
